examples: Place the wizard from image 2 in the ancient library from image 3, holding and studying the magical crystal orb from image 1. The orb's glow illuminates his face with purple and blue light. Floating candles around him, ancient books visible in the background. Mystical, dramatic lighting, fantasy art style, highly detailed.
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Text prompt describing the desired image. Supports Chinese and English. Max 2000 characters. Example: 'Generate an image using the style of image 1 and background of image 2'.

num_images.title: Num Images
num_images.description: Number of images to generate (1-4). Directly affects billing cost.

image_size.title: Image Size
image_size.description: Output image size. Use presets like 'square_hd', 'landscape_16_9', 'portrait_9_16', or specify exact dimensions with ImageSize(width=1280, height=720). Total pixels must be between 768*768 and 1280*1280.

enable_prompt_expansion.title: Enable Prompt Expansion
enable_prompt_expansion.description: Enable LLM prompt optimization. Significantly improves results for simple prompts but adds 3-4 seconds processing time.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed for reproducibility (0-2147483647). Same seed produces more consistent results.

image_urls.title: Image Urls
image_urls.description: Reference images for editing (1-3 images required). Order matters: reference as 'image 1', 'image 2', 'image 3' in prompt. Resolution: 384-5000px each dimension. Max size: 10MB each. Formats: JPEG, JPG, PNG (no alpha), BMP, WEBP.

examples: low resolution, error, worst quality, low quality, deformed, extra fingers
negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Content to avoid in the generated image. Max 500 characters.

enable_safety_checker.title: Enable Safety Checker
enable_safety_checker.description: Enable content moderation for input and output.

description: Input for Wan 2.6 image editing with reference images (enable_interleave=false)
title: ImageEditInput
